title: 87. Holding Space for a Broken Heart
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are talking all about heartbreak. I offer a different remedy to "getting over it" in this episode as we discuss the highs and lows of a broken heart and the importance of holding space for yourself during this time. Tune in to hear more!

Click here to get your FREE copy of my guide on toxic shame & low self-esteem
(or visit beatricekamau.com/freeguide)

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
